channel.title: GCon - Eotenweard - the Abbey
channel.description:
When Abbot Ceganos seeks help finding two missing novices from the Abbey of St Anselm, Regenmaer the Hammer of the Gods looks for nails, while Cuthred the Commoner seeks Woden's guidance through his goat. Meanwhile, Bryn the Fae Changeling (with something of the light about him) tries to stop Wulfric the Loon doing something dangerous or stupid. Then ... there's a Marsh Drake, curious observers, a Priestess ... and a fire ...
https://youtu.be/2dtbTPaVyCs
